title: Cannondale’s Overhauled 2025 Synapse Runs Its Electronics From a Single Battery and Has Burrito Storage
content:
Remember that clunky SmartSense system? It's back and wrapped around one of the most compelling road bikes of 2025.

Read the full article at Cannondale’s Overhauled 2025 Synapse Runs Its Electronics From a Single Battery and Has Burrito Storage on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
